description:
• Implemented and consumed API for SCBlife app.
  • Implemented testing script for test API and apply CI/CD for automate deployment.
  • Implemented and monitored API for analyze service and fix problems by using ELK stack.

• Implemented testing script.
  • Implemented web service, API , Dashboard for investigate performance testing.
  • ETL data from log and testing results into Elasticsearch.
  • Analysis and visualization data from Elasticsearch for investigation performance testing.

• Developed program and script to create report of metric with time series historical data from graphite and monitoring metric from grafana.
  • Developed web application (Dashboard) and web service for monitoring customer jobs.
  • Analyzed customer usage the system for find pattern of wrong usage.

• Analyzed and Designed Algorithm.
  • Designed and Implemented for effective programs
companyName: Jiangxi University of Science and Technology
